bibl.title: A Pathyrite Bath-House, Egyptian Water Law and ""Rights of Way"".
bibl.note: 1. A Pathyrite bath-house. Examines an unusual clause in an unpublished Demotic land sale contract (P. Lond. Inv. EA 10518 ined.). - 2. Egyptian water law: Access to and use of water; - What was immediate source of the water?; - Express grant of rights to access and use water sources (VI). - Conclusions: Rights over other people's land.
bibl.seg: Siân E. Thomas, A Pathyrite Bath-House, Egyptian Water Law and ""Rights of Way"".
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 419-431, 1 schéma.

1. A Pathyrite bath-house. Examines an unusual clause in an unpublished Demotic land sale contract (P. Lond. Inv. EA 10518 ined.). - 2. Egyptian water law: Access to and use of water; - What was immediate source of the water?; - Express grant of rights to access and use water sources (VI). - Conclusions: Rights over other people's land.
